duties_responsibilities.duty: Review and participate in the negotiation of assigned contracts and agreements with customers, prospects, suppliers, and vendors.
Develop and update contract documents and standardize agreements across the company.
Coordinate with outside counsel and executive team to address complex contracts.
Maintain and track contract-related documents and correspondence.
Keep the company informed on new laws, rules, requirements, and regulations.
Assist with the consolidation of contracts and agreements associated with mergers and acquisitions.
Prepare certain customer-related documents such as company questionnaires, inquiries, and RFI’s.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Engineering, Business Administration, or Construction Management (Preferred)
